ctext: Daman and Diu revokes mandatory Rakshabandhan in offices order. Women employees were earlier asked to tie rakhis to male colleagues. After backlash, the order was withdrawn within 24 hours.
Apple unveils the new iPhone 15 with advanced features, including a periscope lens for better zoom, faster processor, and improved battery life. The phone is set to hit markets in September.
headlines: Apple launches iPhone 15 with new features

ctext: Tesla achieves a breakthrough in autonomous driving technology. The new update allows cars to self-navigate complex city environments, marking a significant milestone for the company.
